TopicTitle: Has anyone ever replicated the Space Odyssey opening in KSP?

Articles.Content: Thus far? I don't think so. Nassault630 has created some very nice cinematics in KSP though and would probably be the most likely to attempt such a task.
I think it's be pretty cool to see done. If anyone's unclear on the part I mean, I mean the title sequence with the Moon, Earth, Sun and Also Sprach Zarathustra.
Heh, Big cinematic approach to the space station culminating with the ship slamming into the docking port too fast and exploding.
